statements: SELECT * FROM SmartGridFaultDetection WHERE fault_type = 'Overload'
SELECT id, device_id, fault_type FROM SmartGridFaultDetection WHERE is_resolved = TRUE
SELECT device_id, fault_type, detection_timestamp FROM SmartGridFaultDetection ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM SmartGridFaultDetection LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1
SELECT id, fault_type, analysis_result FROM SmartGridFaultDetection WHERE device_id = 100
SELECT * FROM SmartGridFaultDetection WHERE is_resolved = true;
SELECT id, fault_type FROM SmartGridFaultDetection WHERE detection_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_faults FROM SmartGridFaultDetection WHERE fault_type LIKE '%voltage%';
SELECT device_id, fault_type, detection_timestamp FROM SmartGridFaultDetection ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT fault_type FROM SmartGridFaultDetection ORDER BY fault_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_grid_fault_detection;
SELECT device_id, fault_type, fault_details FROM smart_grid_fault_detection WHERE detection_status=true;
SELECT id, timestamp, device_id FROM smart_grid_fault_detection ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, affected_devices, outage_type FROM outage_management WHERE estimated_recovery_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, timestamp FROM outage_management WHERE outage_type='Planned' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_grid_fault_detection WHERE detection_status = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, fault_type, detection_status FROM smart_grid_fault_detection WHERE fault_type = 'Power Surge' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, device_id, fault_details FROM smart_grid_fault_detection WHERE fault_details LIKE '%short circuit%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, timestamp, device_id, fault_type, fault_details FROM smart_grid_fault_detection WHERE device_id = 123 AND fault_type = 'Overload';
SELECT * FROM outage_management WHERE location = 'Main Street' AND outage_type = 'Equipment Failure' ORDER BY estimated_recovery_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM FaultDetection;
SELECT id, fault_type, detection_timestamp FROM FaultDetection WHERE device_id = 100;
SELECT device_id, fault_type FROM FaultDetection WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, outage_start_timestamp, outage_end_timestamp FROM OutageManagement ORDER BY outage_start_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, data_type, data_value, data_timestamp FROM RealTimeData WHERE data_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, device_id, fault_type, detection_timestamp FROM FaultDetection WHERE fault_type = 'Hardware Failure';
SELECT id, device_id, data_type, data_value FROM RealTimeData ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_faults FROM FaultDetection GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT device_id, AVG(data_value) AS avg_data_value FROM RealTimeData WHERE data_type = 'Temperature' GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT f.id, f.device_id, f.fault_type, o.outage_start_timestamp FROM FaultDetection AS f JOIN OutageManagement AS o ON f.device_id = o.device_id;
SELECT * FROM FaultDetection WHERE fault_type='Overload';
SELECT * FROM OutageManagement ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, device_id, timestamp FROM RealTimeData WHERE voltage > 220;
SELECT id, fault_id, timestamp, description FROM FaultLog WHERE fault_id=101 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, device_id, timestamp, current FROM RealTimeData WHERE current < 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, fault_type FROM FaultDetection WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, outage_id, timestamp, outage_cause FROM OutageManagement WHERE affected_area = 'Building A' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM RealTimeData WHERE voltage > 220 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, fault_id, timestamp, description FROM FaultLog WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-02-28' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, AVG(voltage), AVG(current) FROM RealTimeData GROUP BY device_id HAVING AVG(power) > 5000 ORDER BY AVG(voltage) DESC;
SELECT * FROM SmartMeters;
SELECT meter_id, customer_id, location FROM SmartMeters WHERE install_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT line_id, voltage, length, material FROM PowerLines WHERE voltage > 100;
SELECT * FROM Faults ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT meter_id, timestamp, voltage, current FROM RealTimeData WHERE current > 10;
SELECT * FROM SmartMeters;
SELECT location, install_date FROM SmartMeters WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT meter_id, customer_id, install_date FROM SmartMeters WHERE location LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT line_id, voltage, material FROM PowerLines ORDER BY voltage DESC;
SELECT outage_id, line_id, start_time, end_time FROM Outages WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
